short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We bring life into your links. Linksafe is a revolution in how people use web to achieve results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bringing Life Into Links - We turn your web experience into consumable and actionable knowledge.

- Make LinkSafe Your Single Bookmark Manager: Use LinkSafe to store the links to the webpages you use at home, or at work. Create categories to organize them in a meaningful way. Use tags to give them meaning and to access them quickly.

- Turn Websites To Sources of Your Knowledge: Use the Categories, Tags, Description, and Notes, to create a Knowledge Portal from what you know. Access the information you need in a matter of seconds, instead of wondering for minutes where you have stored your links.

- Discover New Sources of Curated Knowledge: Use our well curated Broadcasts to learn about new tools, solutions, or simply insights. Store the broadcasts next to your own categories to access all your online knowledge from one single webpage. Save linksafe.io as your homepage.

To get started, create a free account at https://app.linksafe.io
